answers.answer: When i went for mine, it was a VERY long and drawn out process. I actually felt sick for a the last half.  But when it's over, it doesn't seem that bad.  It's making it through the duration that's torture.  I wouldn't stress too terribly much over it for now.  Even if it's positive, it's really not that bad.  Just a few more restrictions on your diet.  Good luck...and bring a book to read.  And if you feel sick, ask if you can lay down for awhile...they'll usually let you have a bed.
i was okay until the 1/2 hour or so.  i developed a pretty bad headache - probably because i was so hungry :)  taking a good book is an excellent suggestion.

I felt hungry and like I was going to pass out.  But one of my friends felt ok.  Hopefully it goes well for you.  And if you fail, the diet isn't too bad and it is better to know so you can do what is best for your baby.  Good luck!
